channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours
channel.description: RSS feed with direct links to popular technology articles. based on superdigg pipe

item.title: [+3841] An Open Letter to Conan O'Brien
item.description: I'm taking this opportunity to officially offer you a brand-new show of your choosing here at Revision3. Rest assured, you'll be able to bring your set, band and even Andy (especially Andy) with you as you transition to our cutting-edge online TV network.

item.title: [+2893] Lets not lie, who else's weekend is exactly like this? [Pic]

[+2472] I am the master of my fate [PIC]
item.description: I am the captain of my soul.

item.title: [+1742] Cat who boarded same bus every day for four years killed
item.description: Casper, a cat which became famous for catching the same bus every day for four years, has been run over and killed - while crossing the road to catch its daily lift.

item.title: [+1623] The Stig has been spotted on Google StreetView!
item.description: It's like 'Where's Waldo' for Top Gear fans!

item.title: [+1478] That rock looks like ...
[+1476] Student Invents a Foldable Space Saving Power Plug
item.description: Industrial designers sometimes make the mistake of thinking that certain product elements are written in stone, or that they just aren't worth thinking about. Sometimes it takes a set of fresh eyes to see an exceptionally simple yet innovative solution.

item.title: [+1367] ATM Skimmers: Can You Spot them in the Wild? (pics)
item.description: Pictured is what’s known as a skimmer, or a device made to be affixed to the mouth of an ATM machine and secretly swipe credit and debit card information when bank customers slip their cards into the machines to pull out money. (This is BB's source link.)

item.title: [+1222] Danger Man is watching you play safe!! (Pic)
[+1198] Apple showing off its 'latest creation' on January 27!
item.description: Yes folks -- the rumors are true. Apple is holding an event on January 27th to show off something the company is calling their "latest creation." Read more at Engadget!

item.title: [+1183] Instant manliness [PIC]
[+1158] BREAKING: Magnitude 6.0 quake hits Guatemala coast
item.description: A magnitude 6.0 earthquake hit Guatemala's Pacific coast near the border with El Salvador.

item.title: [+985] A Love Story (COMIC)
item.description: I think all us guys have known a 'Sheila' who needs to butt the fuck out of our business.

item.title: [+901] U.S. Military Weapons Inscribed With Secret Jesus Bible Code
item.description: Coded references to New Testament Bible passages about Jesus Christ are inscribed on high-powered rifle sights provided to the United States military by a Michigan company, an ABC News investigation has found.

item.title: [+873] 15 Annoying Things Most Girlfriends Do, That You Put Up With
item.description: While there are exceptions to every rule, the fact remains that the rule exists. Most women, like men, will behave in certain expected ways, especially once in a committed relationship.

[+757] German government warns citizens off IE (all versions)
item.description: The German government's Federal Office for Information Security is warning computer users in the country NOT to use Microsoft Internet Explorer due to recent security scares.
